ActivateEventSource.name: ActivateEventSource
ActivateEventSource.description: Grants permission to activate partner event sources

CancelReplay.name: CancelReplay
CancelReplay.description: Grants permission to cancel a replay

CreateArchive.name: CreateArchive
CreateArchive.description: Grants permission to create a new archive

CreateEventBus.name: CreateEventBus
CreateEventBus.description: Grants permission to create event buses

CreatePartnerEventSource.name: CreatePartnerEventSource
CreatePartnerEventSource.description: Grants permission to create partner event sources

DeactivateEventSource.name: DeactivateEventSource
DeactivateEventSource.description: Grants permission to deactivate event sources

DeleteArchive.name: DeleteArchive
DeleteArchive.description: Grants permission to delete an archive

DeleteEventBus.name: DeleteEventBus
DeleteEventBus.description: Grants permission to delete event buses

DeletePartnerEventSource.name: DeletePartnerEventSource
DeletePartnerEventSource.description: Grants permission to delete partner event sources

DescribeArchive.name: DescribeArchive
DescribeArchive.description: Grants permission to retrieve details about an archive

DescribeEventBus.name: DescribeEventBus
DescribeEventBus.description: Grants permission to retrieve details about event buses

DescribeEventSource.name: DescribeEventSource
DescribeEventSource.description: Grants permission to retrieve details about event sources

DescribePartnerEventSource.name: DescribePartnerEventSource
DescribePartnerEventSource.description: Grants permission to retrieve details about partner event sources

DescribeReplay.name: DescribeReplay
DescribeReplay.description: Grants permission to retrieve the details of a replay

DescribeRule.name: DescribeRule
DescribeRule.description: Grants permission to retrieve details about rules

ListArchives.name: ListArchives
ListArchives.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of archives

ListEventBuses.name: ListEventBuses
ListEventBuses.description: Grants permission to to retrieve a list of the event buses in your account

ListEventSources.name: ListEventSources
ListEventSources.description: Grants permission to to retrieve a list of event sources shared with this account

ListPartnerEventSourceAccounts.name: ListPartnerEventSourceAccounts
ListPartnerEventSourceAccounts.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of AWS account IDs associated with an event source

ListPartnerEventSources.name: ListPartnerEventSources
ListPartnerEventSources.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list partner event sources

ListReplays.name: ListReplays
ListReplays.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of replays

ListRuleNamesByTarget.name: ListRuleNamesByTarget
ListRuleNamesByTarget.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of the names of the rules associated with a target

ListRules.name: ListRules
ListRules.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of the Amazon EventBridge rules in the account

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description:
Grants permission to retrieve a list of tags associated with an Amazon EventBridge
                                                resource

ListTargetsByRule.name: ListTargetsByRule
ListTargetsByRule.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of targets defined for a rule

PutEvents.name: PutEvents
PutEvents.description: Grants permission to send custom events to Amazon EventBridge

PutPartnerEvents.name: PutPartnerEvents
PutPartnerEvents.description: Grants permission to sends custom events to Amazon EventBridge

PutPermission.name: PutPermission
PutPermission.description:
Grants permission to use the PutPermission action to grants permission to another
                                                AWS account to put events to your default event bus

PutRule.name: PutRule
PutRule.description: Grants permission to create or updates rules

PutTargets.name: PutTargets
PutTargets.description: Grants permission to add targets to a rule

RemovePermission.name: RemovePermission
RemovePermission.description:
Grants permission to revoke the permission of another AWS account to put events to
                                                your default event bus

RemoveTargets.name: RemoveTargets
RemoveTargets.description: Grants permission to removes targets from a rule

StartReplay.name: StartReplay
StartReplay.description: Grants permission to start a replay of an archive

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to add a tag to an Amazon EventBridge resource

TestEventPattern.name: TestEventPattern
TestEventPattern.description: Grants permissions to test whether an event pattern matches the provided event

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove a tag from an Amazon EventBridge resource

UpdateArchive.name: UpdateArchive
UpdateArchive.description: Grants permission to update an archive
